Lean-Agile transformation services

Major Milestones assists Enterprises with a diverse set of Lean-Agile Transformation services.
I am specialized in building next generation teams that optimise all links in your operations related value stream chain.

# about me

Who am I?

I am an all-round seasoned entrepreneur, interim manager and life coach with 41 completed assignments of which seven permanent positions and builds over 35 years of experience.

Originally graduated in Mechanical Engineering and also Business Economics, later complemented by a Master in Change Management at the Erasmus University in Rotterdam, as well as a variety of psychology courses (NLP, Group Dynamic Processes, etc).

Founder and CEO of two disruptive online startups, specialized in Software Development, Lean Startups and also owner of multiple SAFe certifications. Authorized SAFe trainer.

# services

Services that I offer

POC/MVP Lean Startup development
SAFe Framework Implementation (SPC)
Facilitating, coaching and executing ART’s (RTE)
Lean Portfolio Management (LPM)
DevOps implementations (SDP)
Agile Coaching
Metrics & Auditing
SAFe training
